DFRS
Class Flight 

java.lang.Object
  DFRS.Flight
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Flight
				
extends java.lang.Object
				
implements java.io.Serializable

Author:
ulanbaitassov This class used for Flight objects and which contains relevant information about a flight implements Serializable in order to permit saving class objects in file
See Also:

insertRecord

public boolean insertRecord(int new_class,
                            java.lang.String new_r)
Method which inserts passenger record ID in flight record list

Parameters:
new_class - class number 0=first 1=business 2=economy
new_r - record ID
Returns:
true if successfully added in the list

changeFlightData

public void changeFlightData(java.lang.String new_date,
                             java.lang.String new_t,
                             int new_f,
                             int new_b,
                             int new_e)
Method which changes the flight information to new values

Parameters:
new_date - new date of flight
new_t - new time of flight
new_f - new maximum capacity limit for first class
new_b - new maximum capacity limit for business class
new_e - new maximum capacity limit for economy class

shrinkRecords

public void shrinkRecords(int new_class,
                          int new_n)
This method deletes most recent passenger records if the flight size is reduced the minimum limit capacity

Parameters:
new_class - class name such as first, business, economy in integer value 0,1,2 respectively
new_n - new maximum capacity limit

getNumberRecords

public int getNumberRecords(java.lang.String recordType)
Get method which returns the number of occupied seats in a given class

Parameters:
recordType - class name
Returns:
number of occupied seats in given class, returns zero if no proper class found
